item.title: Java Pesistence API Notes
item.description: JPA As you create Session from a SessionFactory, it’s not hard to understand that you use EntityManagerFactory to create an instance of EntityManager. However, because JPA is a standard applicable to Enterprise and Standalone applications, there are a couple of modes for obtaining or creating the EntityManagerFactory itself—one that will be created in a managed environment such as Application Servers or Web containers while the other in a standalone application.
